title: Emmerdale spoilers: Nate's mum Cara arrives to reunite with Cain?
text:
Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) may well be in for a blast from the past as Emmerdale fans are expecting to soon meet Nate Robinson’s (Jurell Carter) mum Cara – but what will she have to say to Cain if she does turn up? And what will it mean for the future of Cain and his estranged wife Moira (Natalie J Robb)?

While no announcement has been made that Cara is being cast or there is an arrival planned, viewers are surmising that there is a long way to go with this story and it would be a wasted opportunity to start this storyline without exploring it fully – especially as it has cost us the Coira partnership.

At the moment, Cain detests Nate and can’t accept him as his blood, seeing as Nate rocked up filled with hate and ideas of revenge and deliberately set out to seduce Moira. With an affair following, Cain’s life and marriage are in ruins.

Advertisement

Advertisement

And Nate isn’t particularly keen on Cain either seeing as he feels abandoned by his long lost dad – who he has been brought up thinking never wanted anything to do with him. He has since learned that Cain didn’t actually know he existed thanks to the interference of Faith (Sally Dexter) but there are still a lot of unresolved feelings.

Nate has kept it to himself where Cara is right now and what her life is like but it seems likely that she may well turn up in Emmerdale – given their history and the fact that they have a son together, could she end up reuniting with Cain? Stranger things have happened…

And a reunion for Cain and Moira certainly seems off the cards as next week will see Cain get rid of his wedding ring, shattering Moira’s hopes that there is any chance of them sorting things out.
